result.title: one of the toughest problem ive seen
result.content: hello codeforces and its members, sorry to bother you again. i want to ask you guys how to solve this problem from uva judge? problem name is attractive grid and here the link = https://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/126/p12610.pdf . is this some advanced data structure problem? ive no idea how to solve it or what kind of algo to use. can someone help? thank u people very much.
